Elon Musk is a South African-born entrepreneur, inventor, and business magnate. He is the CEO and CTO of SpaceX, CEO of Neuralink, and CEO of The Boring Company. He is also the founder and CEO of Tesla, Inc., where he has played a significant role in disrupting the electric car industry. Musk is known for his ambitious goals, such as establishing a human settlement on Mars and reducing the world's reliance on fossil fuels.
